verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD קְ֭רָאתִיךָ <WH7121> Ke-ra-ti-cha I cry ח֣וּשָׁה <WH2363> Chu-shah unto thee make haste לִּ֑י Li; הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah unto me give ear ק֝וֹלִ֗י <WH6963> ko-Li, unto my voice בְּקָרְאִי־ <WH7121> be-ka-re-'i- when I cry לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

תִּכּ֤וֹן <WH3559> tik-Kon be set forth תְּפִלָּתִ֣י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti Let my prayer קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> ke-To-ret thee [as] incense לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha; before מַֽשְׂאַ֥ת <WH4864> mas-'At [and] the lifting up כַּ֝פַּ֗י <WH3709> kap-Pai, of my hands מִנְחַת־ <WH4503> min-chat- sacrifice עָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> 'A-rev. [as] the evening

שִׁיתָ֣ה <WH7896> shi-Tah Set יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD שָׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8108> sha-me-Rah a watch לְפִ֑י <WH6310> le-Fi; before my mouth נִ֝צְּרָ֗ה <WH5341> nitz-tze-Rah, keep עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over דַּ֥ל <WH1817> dal the door שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <WH8193> se-fa-Tai. of my lips אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תַּט־ <WH5186> tat- afternoon

לִבִּ֨י <WH3820> lib-Bi not my heart לְדָבָ֪ר׀ <WH1697> le-da-Var thing רָ֡ע <WH7451> ra' to [any] evil לְהִתְע֘וֹלֵ֤ל <WH5953> le-hit-'o-Lel to practise עֲלִל֨וֹת׀ <WH5949> a-li-Lot works בְּרֶ֗שַׁע <WH7562> be-Re-sha', wicked אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for אִישִׁ֥ים <WH582> 'i-Shim who פֹּֽעֲלֵי־ <WH6466> po-'a-lei- that work אָ֑וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven; iniquity וּבַל־ <WH1077> u-val- lest אֶ֝לְחַ֗ם <WH3898> 'el-Cham, and let me not eat בְּמַנְעַמֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH4516> be-man-'am-mei-Hem. of their dainties

יֶֽהֶלְמֵֽנִי־ <WH1986> ye-hel-me-ni- smite צַדִּ֨יק׀ <WH6662> tzad-Dik Let the righteous חֶ֡סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed me [it shall be] a kindness וְֽיוֹכִיחֵ֗נִי <WH3198> ve-yo-chi-Che-ni, and let him reprove שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> She-men oil רֹ֭אשׁ <WH7218> rosh me [it shall be] an excellent אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יָנִ֣י <WH5106> ya-Ni [which] shall not break רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> ro-Shi; my head כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- For ע֥וֹד <WH5750> od still וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <WH8605> u-te-fil-la-Ti, for yet my prayer בְּרָעוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7451> be-ra-'o-tei-Hem. also [shall be] in their calamities

נִשְׁמְט֣וּ <WH8058> nish-me-Tu are overthrown בִֽידֵי־ <WH3027> vi-dei- places סֶ֭לַע <WH5553> Se-la' in stony שֹׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8199> sho-fe-tei-Hem; When their judges וְשָׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> ve-sha-me-'U they shall hear אֲ֝מָרַ֗י <WH561> 'a-ma-Rai, my words כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for נָעֵֽמוּ׃ <WH5276> na-'E-mu. for they are sweet

כְּמ֤וֹ <WH3644> ke-Mo one פֹלֵ֣חַ <WH6398> fo-Le-ach as when one cutteth וּבֹקֵ֣עַ <WH1234> u-vo-Ke-a' and cleaveth בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz; [wood] upon the earth נִפְזְר֥וּ <WH6340> nif-ze-Ru are scattered עֲ֝צָמֵ֗ינוּ <WH6106> 'a-tza-Mei-nu, Our bones לְפִ֣י <WH6310> le-Fi mouth שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <WH7585> she-'ol. at the grave's

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אֵלֶ֨יךָ׀ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha are toward יְהוִ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai; But mine eyes בְּכָ֥ה be-Chah חָ֝סִ֗יתִי <WH2620> cha-Si-ti, in thee is my trust אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תְּעַ֥ר <WH6168> te-'Ar destitute נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. not my soul

שָׁמְרֵ֗נִי <WH8104> sha-me-Re-ni, Keep מִ֣ידֵי <WH3027> Mi-dei the jaws פַ֭ח <WH6341> fach of the trap יָ֣קְשׁוּ <WH3369> Ya-ke-shu [which] they have laid לִ֑י Li; וּ֝מֹקְשׁ֗וֹת <WH4170> u-mo-ke-Shot, for me and the gins פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei of the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> 'A-ven. of iniquity

יִפְּל֣וּ <WH5307> yip-pe-Lu fall בְמַכְמֹרָ֣יו <WH4364> ve-mach-mo-Rav into their own nets רְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im; Let the wicked יַ֥חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad whilst that I withal אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi, I עַֽד־ <WH5704> 'ad- While אֶעֱבֽוֹר׃ <WH5674> e-'e-Vor. escape
